languages.text: {n}Лицо Джай становится непривычно серьезным.{/n} "Мне тоже не по душе играться с силами варпа, шерин. Но идея оставить в покое врага с занесенным кинжалом нравится мне еще меньше".
{n}Jae's expression becomes unusually serious.{/n} "I'm not keen on toying with the powers of the warp either, shereen. But ignoring the raised dagger in an enemy's hand is an idea I like even less."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Джай становится непривычно серьезным.{/n} "Мне тоже не по душе играться с силами варпа, шерин. Но идея оставить в покое врага с занесенным кинжалом нравится мне еще меньше".

languages.text: {n}ジェイの表情は珍しく真剣なものとなる。{/n}「ワープの力で遊ぶのは気が進まないさ、シャリーン。ですが、敵の手に掲げられた武器を無視するなんて、それ以上に気に入らない」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression becomes unusually serious.{/n} "I'm not keen on toying with the powers of the warp either, shereen. But ignoring the raised dagger in an enemy's hand is an idea I like even less."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの表情は珍しく真剣なものとなる。{/n}「ワープの力で遊ぶのは気が進まないさ、シャリーン。ですが、敵の手に掲げられた武器を無視するなんて、それ以上に気に入らない」

languages.text: {n}Jae adopta una aspecto serio nada característico de ella.{/n} «A mí tampoco me hace gracia trastear con los poderes de la disformidad, shereen. Pero me apetece aún menos ignorar el arma que nuestro enemigo tiene en la mano».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression becomes unusually serious.{/n} "I'm not keen on toying with the powers of the warp either, shereen. But ignoring the raised dagger in an enemy's hand is an idea I like even less."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae adopta una aspecto serio nada característico de ella.{/n} «A mí tampoco me hace gracia trastear con los poderes de la disformidad, shereen. Pero me apetece aún menos ignorar el arma que nuestro enemigo tiene en la mano».

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Jae exprime un sérieux inhabituel.{/n} « Je n'aime pas non plus jouer avec les pouvoirs du Warp, shereen. Mais j'aime encore moins ignorer la dague brandie par la main de l'ennemi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression becomes unusually serious.{/n} "I'm not keen on toying with the powers of the warp either, shereen. But ignoring the raised dagger in an enemy's hand is an idea I like even less."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Jae exprime un sérieux inhabituel.{/n} « Je n'aime pas non plus jouer avec les pouvoirs du Warp, shereen. Mais j'aime encore moins ignorer la dague brandie par la main de l'ennemi. »

languages.text: {n}婕伊的表情变得异常严肃。{/n}“我也不喜欢随意玩弄亚空间的力量，亲爱的，但我更不喜欢对敌人手中的匕首视而不见。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression becomes unusually serious.{/n} "I'm not keen on toying with the powers of the warp either, shereen. But ignoring the raised dagger in an enemy's hand is an idea I like even less."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的表情变得异常严肃。{/n}“我也不喜欢随意玩弄亚空间的力量，亲爱的，但我更不喜欢对敌人手中的匕首视而不见。”

languages.text: {n}Jae macht ein ungewohnt ernstes Gesicht.{/n} "Ich bin auch nicht scharf darauf, mit den Kräften des Warp zu spielen, Shereen. Aber den erhobenen Dolch in der Hand eines Feindes zu ignorieren, gefällt mir noch weniger."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression becomes unusually serious.{/n} "I'm not keen on toying with the powers of the warp either, shereen. But ignoring the raised dagger in an enemy's hand is an idea I like even less."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae macht ein ungewohnt ernstes Gesicht.{/n} "Ich bin auch nicht scharf darauf, mit den Kräften des Warp zu spielen, Shereen. Aber den erhobenen Dolch in der Hand eines Feindes zu ignorieren, gefällt mir noch weniger."

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın suratı, nadiren görülen bir ciddiyete bürünüyor.{/n} "Ben de öteboyut güçlerini karşıma almaya pek isteksizim şirinim. Fakat düşmanın elinde havaya kalkmış bir hançeri yok sayma fikrine daha soğuk baktığımı söyleyebiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression becomes unusually serious.{/n} "I'm not keen on toying with the powers of the warp either, shereen. But ignoring the raised dagger in an enemy's hand is an idea I like even less."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın suratı, nadiren görülen bir ciddiyete bürünüyor.{/n} "Ben de öteboyut güçlerini karşıma almaya pek isteksizim şirinim. Fakat düşmanın elinde havaya kalkmış bir hançeri yok sayma fikrine daha soğuk baktığımı söyleyebiliriz."
